title: Gugulethu0101
author: Gugulethu0101
created_time: June 21, 2023, 02:11:47 PMLast edit: December 05, 2024, 01:36:58 PM by Gugulethu0101
content: ✔️✔️✔️SUPER FAST ACCOUNT CREATION.✔️✔️✔️ Expect account delivery by CHAT within 2-8 hours.*Save your files to Google Drive and photos to Google Photos and get them from any device, anywhere!PRICE: $30https://mydigdup.sellpass.io/Proof: https://imgur.com/o4HE9DdProof: https://imgur.com/I76Bjuz⚙️Information:* ✅ Custom Username (yourname@ourdomain)* ✅ This is a brand new account. NOT applicable/upgradable to any of your existing account* ✅ Lifetime Access* ✅ Our domain is not yes(dot)my, outlook(dot)com, hotmail(dot)com, microsoft(dot)com or gmail(dot)com.* ✅ Our domain extension will be (dot)com* ✅ Gmail, Google Drive, Google Photos and Google Meet services.* ✅ Custom username (eg. yourname@ourdomain) * ✅ Please provide custom yourname@ AFTER click on CHECK OUT and in textbox "MESSAGE: " provided (Message to Seller) before placing your order so there will be no delay in account creation/delivery.⚙️Specification:* ✅ New Account.* ✅ Unlimited Google Drive and Google Photos storage* ✅ Random username / Custom username* ✅ Not .edu email* ✅ Not Team Drive / Shared Drive* ✅ Support Google Backup & Sync* ✅ Support Self-Password recovery* ✅ All API-related apps/3rd party apps will be monitored and verified upon approval.* ✅ Unlimited Google Drive storage* ✅ Lifetime License* ✅ 100% genuine Google My Drive by Google.* ✅ Gmail, drive, photos, meet and others supported.* ✅ Files / folders sharing is supported via link.* ✅ Google Photos sharing is supported.* ✅ Google Meet recording is supported.* ✅ Upload any files (data, photo, music, video, documents) onto your Google drive.* ✅ Access your files from anywhere (mobile, tablet, PC etc)* ✅ Private storage (only you can access, no one else)* ✅ One-time payment only (No Monthly/Yearly Subscription)* ✅ High speed access to Google Data Centre.* ✅ All questions/messages will be replied within 12 hours.Frequently asked question: Q : Can i use my existing email? A : NoQ : Can i choose the username? A : Yes, you can choose usernameQ : Can i change the password? A : Yes, its all yours.Q : Is it a .edu (education) email? A : No, it's not a .edu email addressQ : Is this a Shared Drive / Team Drive? A : No, it's not.

comments.author: StuffSneak
comments.body: Do you provide any warranty on account?

comments.author: MarcusDeMan
comments.created_time: June 22, 2023, 09:10:55 PMLast edit: November 07, 2023, 04:00:05 PM by MarcusDeMan
comments.body: Seller was responsive to answer my questions on T.me.Bought account today and received it quite shortly.As stated I got the drive with my own chosen username. Domainname was as given.G-drive states I have now 9.76PB available Cloud drive got wasted after just a few weeks.Also no replacement so no "Lifetime license" or whatever that means.

comments.author: Gugulethu0101
comments.body: Quote from: StuffSneak on June 22, 2023, 08:39:17 PMDo you provide any warranty on account?I can only provide a 2 mopnth warranty on the accounts since I am selling accounts under 1 admin and if someone abuses the account and gets it suspended the entire admin will be suspended. If your looking for a lifetime warranty then you will need to get your own admin account to avoid someone misusing the accounts.

comments.author: Gugulethu0101
comments.body: Quote from: MarcusDeMan on June 22, 2023, 09:10:55 PMSeller was responsive to answer my questions on T.me.Bought account today and received it quite shortly.As stated I got the drive with my own chosen username. Domainname was as given.G-drive states I have now 9.76PB available Thanks for the review, if you ever need more accounts in the future I will offer you a good discount.

comments.author: Woodie
comments.body: Quote from: Gugulethu0101 on June 23, 2023, 10:28:00 AMQuote from: StuffSneak on June 22, 2023, 08:39:17 PMDo you provide any warranty on account?I can only provide a 2 mopnth warranty on the accounts since I am selling accounts under 1 admin and if someone abuses the account and gets it suspended the entire admin will be suspended. If your looking for a lifetime warranty then you will need to get your own admin account to avoid someone misusing the accounts.Considering you have brought in potential scenarios of being suspened...Do you have Dos and Don'ts when it comes to using these accounts for longevity.

comments.author: Gugulethu0101
comments.body: Quote from: Woodie on July 11, 2023, 10:40:44 AMQuote from: Gugulethu0101 on June 23, 2023, 10:28:00 AMQuote from: StuffSneak on June 22, 2023, 08:39:17 PMDo you provide any warranty on account?I can only provide a 2 mopnth warranty on the accounts since I am selling accounts under 1 admin and if someone abuses the account and gets it suspended the entire admin will be suspended. If your looking for a lifetime warranty then you will need to get your own admin account to avoid someone misusing the accounts.Considering you have brought in potential scenarios of being suspened...Do you have Dos and Don'ts when it comes to using these accounts for longevity. With single accounts there's nothing I can do about how other people use the accounts. I have tried disabling the APIs, but now I already have some admins that have been suspended and I am replacing them. If you want to secure your data you will need to buy yourself an admin that you won't share with anyone.
